No. 86653)} Sub:: Rectification of Accident Blackspots Guidelines on preparation of proposals, granting sanctions, execution of works, etc. reg: In continuation to Policy Circular No. 12.25/2022 dated 12.04.2022 wherein under para 6.2 powers were delegated to Regional Officers for long-term rectification work of MoRTH identified blackspots upto Rs.50 Crore per blackspot (including cost of land acquisition) , the following para may also be read in conjunction with para 6.2 of the cited Circular dated 12.04.2022. "The delegated power to ROs is Rs.50 Crore for each MoRTH identified blackspot: Considering that a number of such MoRTH identified blackspots may be located in the nearby  vicinity, ROs can take a judicious decision to combine bids   for rectification of such blackspots into a single bid, if feasible, instead of inviting separate bids for each blackspot: 2 The other terms and conditions of the Circular shall remain the same_ 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
